section4.text: üöÄ 6 Steps to buy in to AIGOS Presale. 1) Connect Wallet 2) Click buy with USDT and Enter AIGOS amount to buy 3) Click convert USDT and approve in wallet 4) Click convert USDT again to spend USDT 5) AIGOS will be credited to wallet when Presale ends 6) So you have to sign 2 tx 1 is for approve and one for spend

section6: üë®‚ÄçüöÄ AIGOS MISSION Welcome to Aigos, a groundbreaking project at the forefront of blockchain innovation. At Aigos, our mission is clear: to empower omnichain interoperability and revolutionize the way blockchain networks communicate and transact.

section8.text: OUR TEAM WHAT IS BLOCKCHAIN WHITHOUT PEOPLE? WE have a core team of 5 members Morphues is our Founder and the man with the plan focussing on the big picture X-MAN is our lead developer with over 12 years experience in IT he is a fullstack blockchain dev since 2016 contributing to various projects HE-MAN is our front end dev. focussing on the platform and game to come. IP-MAN is our finfancial expert with over 5 years in executive functions at different major financial players focussing on tokenomics and liquidity WONDER-WOMAN is our marketing specialist focussing on blockchain marketing and social media community engagement
